title: Welcome to HQ!
text: This is your default landing page.

title: The sidebar
text: The sidebar shows your some quick access links for your apps.

title: Light/Dark mode toggle
text: You can toggle light/dark mode using these buttons. Try toggling between light/dark modes by clicking on them.

title: Pinned Apps
text: Your pinned apps are shown under this menu

title: Featured Apps
text: Your featured apps are shown here.

title: Manage apps
text: You can install more apps, pin them, feature them on the sidebar using this link.

title: The Header
text: The header contains buttons for toggling the sidebar visibility, your current location, and other quick links.

title: Toggle Sidebar
text: The sidebar can be toggled between expanded/mini version and on smaller screen the sidebar is hidden and can be accessed using this button.

title: Search button
text: You can quickly search contacts, hashtags, forums and help files.

title: Notifications
text: Your notifications can be accessed using this dropdown.

title: User Menu
text: You can view/edit your profile(s), switch to other channels, view settings or logout from here

title: Activity Overview
text: Your recently uploaded photos, posts, webpages, wiki pages, etc are shown here.

title: Messages Widget
text: This widget shows you recent posts from your network, direct messages, starred posts(if enabled), saved folders(if enabled) and notification.
